title: Black Friday deal: AirPods Pro 2 price drops to just $169.99
description: Apple's flagship earbuds, the AirPods Pro 2 with USB-C case, drops to the lowest price we've seen with this new Black Friday deal. (via Cult of Mac - Apple news, rumors, reviews and how-tos)
author: Rajesh Pandey
excerpt: Apple's flagship earbuds, the AirPods Pro 2 with USB-C case, drops to the lowest price we've seen with this new Black Friday deal.
text: Daily deals With this sale, you can get AirPods Pro 2 with the coveted USB-C case for less than $170! Photo: Leander Kahney/Cult of Mac AirPods Pro are the best pair of wireless earbuds you can buy for your iPhone. And a fantastic early Black Friday deal knocks the AirPods Pro 2 price down to just $169.99 (regularly $249) making them an even better buy. This is just a dollar higher than the all-time lowest price. Now that AirPods Pro 2 can act as hearing aids, it’s hard to recommend any other earbuds for your iPhone, Mac or iPad. And yes, this is for the latest model with the USB-C charging case. This post contains affiliate links. Cult of Mac may earn a commission when you use our links to buy items. AirPods Pro sale: Save on Apple noise-canceling earbuds The AirPods Pro 2 earbuds in this Black Friday deal deliver up to two times more effective noise cancellation and better sound quality than their predecessors. This is backed by a claimed six hours of music playback with ANC on. (You can extend this to 30 hours using the bundled carrying case.) Apple’s flagship earbuds are incredibly portable, and yet they deliver excellent audio and superior noise cancellation. Cult of Mac‘s review of AirPods Pro 2 “a must-have for Apple users and a solid choice for anyone.” USB-C case, H2 chip and all the latest Apple tech As with the iPhone 15 lineup, Apple switched to a USB-C port on the AirPods Pro charging case last year. Snatch up AirPods Pro 2 in this Black Friday sale, and you won’t need to hunt for a Lightning cable when you need to top-up the earbuds’ MagSafe-compatible case. The case also comes with one of Apple’s U1 chips inside. That, along with a tiny built-in speaker, makes the case easier to find. Plus, thanks to Apple’s H2 chip, AirPods Pro can automatically connect with other Apple devices logged into your iCloud account. Then you can seamlessly switch between them at will. (Read more about the AirPods Pro with USB-C case on Apple’s specs page.) If you already own a Vision Pro headset, or plan on getting one, this model of AirPods Pro will perfectly complement your $3,499 Apple headset. In fact, they are the only earbuds that can deliver Lossless Audio with low latency when paired with the Vision Pro. Save on AirPods Pro 2 with this early Black Friday deal With this new deal dropping the AirPods Pro 2  price from $249 to just $168.29, there’s no reason not to pull the trigger if you want Apple’s noise-canceling earbuds. This is even lower than the best price we saw for AirPods Pro 2 during last year’s Black Friday sales. Buy from: Amazon Best earbuds for Apple ecosystem AirPods Pro 2 with USB-C charging case 4.5 AirPods Pro 2 are the best wireless earbuds you can buy for your iPhone and other Apple gear. They offer excellent sound quality, battery life and active noise cancellation, among other advanced features. Pros:Excellent ANCDouble as clinical-grade hearing aidsUSB-C wireless charging case Cons:More expensive than similar earbuds We earn a commission if you make a purchase, at no additional cost to you. html:
• Daily deals

AirPods Pro are the best pair of wireless earbuds you can buy for your iPhone. And a fantastic early Black Friday deal knocks the AirPods Pro 2 price down to just $169.99 (regularly $249) making them an even better buy. This is just a dollar higher than the all-time lowest price.

Now that AirPods Pro 2 can act as hearing aids, it’s hard to recommend any other earbuds for your iPhone, Mac or iPad. And yes, this is for the latest model with the USB-C charging case.

This post contains affiliate links. Cult of Mac may earn a commission when you use our links to buy items.

AirPods Pro sale: Save on Apple noise-canceling earbuds

The AirPods Pro 2 earbuds in this Black Friday deal deliver up to two times more effective noise cancellation and better sound quality than their predecessors. This is backed by a claimed six hours of music playback with ANC on. (You can extend this to 30 hours using the bundled carrying case.)

Apple’s flagship earbuds are incredibly portable, and yet they deliver excellent audio and superior noise cancellation. Cult of Mac‘s review of AirPods Pro 2 “a must-have for Apple users and a solid choice for anyone.”

USB-C case, H2 chip and all the latest Apple tech

As with the iPhone 15 lineup, Apple switched to a USB-C port on the AirPods Pro charging case last year. Snatch up AirPods Pro 2 in this Black Friday sale, and you won’t need to hunt for a Lightning cable when you need to top-up the earbuds’ MagSafe-compatible case. The case also comes with one of Apple’s U1 chips inside. That, along with a tiny built-in speaker, makes the case easier to find.

Plus, thanks to Apple’s H2 chip, AirPods Pro can automatically connect with other Apple devices logged into your iCloud account. Then you can seamlessly switch between them at will. (Read more about the AirPods Pro with USB-C case on Apple’s specs page.)

If you already own a Vision Pro headset, or plan on getting one, this model of AirPods Pro will perfectly complement your $3,499 Apple headset. In fact, they are the only earbuds that can deliver Lossless Audio with low latency when paired with the Vision Pro.

Save on AirPods Pro 2 with this early Black Friday deal

With this new deal dropping the AirPods Pro 2  price from $249 to just $168.29, there’s no reason not to pull the trigger if you want Apple’s noise-canceling earbuds. This is even lower than the best price we saw for AirPods Pro 2 during last year’s Black Friday sales.

Buy from: Amazon

Best earbuds for Apple ecosystem

AirPods Pro 2 with USB-C charging case

4.5

AirPods Pro 2 are the best wireless earbuds you can buy for your iPhone and other Apple gear. They offer excellent sound quality, battery life and active noise cancellation, among other advanced features.

Pros:

  • Excellent ANC
  • Double as clinical-grade hearing aids
  • USB-C wireless charging case

Cons:

  • More expensive than similar earbuds

We earn a commission if you make a purchase, at no additional cost to you.

Note: We originally published this post on February 9, 2024. We updated the pricing.
